描述: A polearm the Starweavers brought from their homeland —  Huaxu. The blade's design and colour are inspired by a unique plant in Huaxu called willow. In Huaxu, this plant typically carries the meaning of "homeland". Although the Starweavers are now busy weaving starry skies across every inch of Atlasia, one day they will return to their verdant homeland of lush willows.
